posts.raw_content:
Lower the monthly payment with a 50 year mortgage and sellers will immediately raise their sales prices to the point where the monthly payment would be right at the maximum buyers can afford to pay. 

That means home prices go UP massively. Great for a wealthy real estate tycoon like Trump, horrible for the average buyer.

This would not open the door to home ownership for millions, it would close the door on them.

posts.raw_content:
I've never felt this amount of disgust and hatred in my life. I've cut off family and friends who vote Democrat. These people are fucking vile. There's no other group of people I instinctively detest. I can understand the mentality behind Islamic zealots and illegal immigrants more than Democrats. Those groups are just doing what self interested demos always do. But Democrats are all pretty much treasonous scum who celebrated their own country being invaded. I now understand why Dante chose the lowest layer of hell for traitors and oath breakers. 

They are still defending this country being invaded by millions of people within the span of 4 years. And they have the audacity to call a moderate like Kirk a Nazi to justify murdering him and cheering for it while his beautiful family mourned. 

I hate these people so much. I want to see conservatives get revenge. I want everything they love to be taken from them. I want them to be censored. I want them to be targeted by banks. I want mobs to burn down and loot their property

In fact- I want Democrats to turn on the radio, sit down at a TV, or play a video game and be inundated 24/7 with right wing ideas. Nonstop. Every single day. 

I don't care anymore. I've done my best to try to get Democrats fired at my workplace. Some days it feels icky to rat out normal people but then I remember how I felt seeing teachers and nurses cheer for Charlie's murder and my resolve just comes back. It's probably not healthy but if I learn someone is a Democrat voter my instinct now is to find ways of separating myself from that person ASAP. I had a colleague insist on eliminating pronouns from our formal writings and it honestly made me snap. I've since then been a Karen sending in mountains of complaints to HR just to get this leftist fired from my project. I don't particularly like being this type of person but I'm just disgusted that I have to endure people like her nonstop.

posts.title: After watching my country get invaded and Charlie's murder being celebrated, I truly loathe all Democrats. Including their voters
